pageSetting.title: 行员考核得分查询

attribute.value: select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='2'

select distinct hylb.lbdh as key,hylb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='2' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select yyjg.tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc, hy.khdxdh, khfa.fabh, khfa.famc, yyjg.yyjg from ( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, sum(yyjg) yyjg from( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, yyjg from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg where 1=1 and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) ) t group by tjrq, fabh, khdxdh ) yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on hy.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh where khfa.yyzlbh=2 and hylb.lbdh='$hylb$' order by khfa.fabh desc,yyjg.yyjg desc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select yyjg.tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc, hy.khdxdh, khfa.fabh, khfa.famc, yyjg.yyjg from ( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, sum(yyjg) yyjg from( select tjrq, fabh, khdxdh, yyjg from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg where 1=1 and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) ) t group by tjrq, fabh, khdxdh ) yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on hy.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh where khfa.yyzlbh=2 and hylb.lbdh='$hylb$' order by khfa.fabh desc,yyjg.yyjg desc ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='2'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct hylb.lbdh as key,hylb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='2' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$
